actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To provide additional compensation for certain World War II veterans who survived the Bataan Death March and were held as prisoners of war by the Japanese.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the military department concerned to pay certain compensation to individuals (or their survivors) who, as members of the armed forces during World War II: (1) were captured on the peninsula of Bataan or the island of Corregidor in the Philippines by Japanese forces; and (2) participated in and survived the Bataan Death March.

titles.title: To provide additional compensation for certain World War II veterans who survived the Bataan Death March and were held as prisoners of war by the Japanese.
